name: Ballatile
description:
Survive for as long as you can in a colourful chain reaction bullet hell

Game created for the Alberta Game Jam 2021 (48 hours)

Theme of "Chain-Reaction"

This is our first Game Jam we've ever participated in, as well as our first game ever.
This is a single screen, space-themed, bullet hell, arcade style game.

We named it 'Ballatile' as a play on Volatile
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Know issue with web version: The timer won't display unless you maximize the game. 
You must go into full screen (the blue arrow box at the bottom left, to see the timer while playing).

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys

DON'T get hit by balls, nor run into the walls or center.
It gets kind of crazy after 30 seconds.

Good luck! Can you make it past 1 minute?
